title: Clippers are in an emergency situation heading to Dallas down 2-0 — Wiley | NBA | SPEAK FOR YOURSELF
author: Speak For Yourself
description:
Last night was a rough one for the Los Angeles Clippers (and Marcellus Wiley). They fall to 0-2 after losing once again to the Dallas Mavericks. Luka Dončić remained hot, finishing with 39 points, while Kawhi Leonard and Paul George combined for nearly 70, but it was not enough, However, George didn't seem to be bothered, saying quote 'there is no concern, there is competition. We got to rise to the occasion..we got to play our game.' Ric Bucher joins Emmanuel Acho and 'Coach' Wiley to discuss whether it's panic time for the Clippers.

#SFY #NBA #KawhiLeonard #PaulGeorge #LukaDončić #Clippers #DallasMavericks
